choices.B: Debugging execution ends in exception, then the connection is closed.
choices.A: The remote robot continues the execution after Studio closes the connection.
choices.D: It is not possible to close the connection while debugging is in progress.
choices.C: Debugging execution stops gracefully, then the connection is closed.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
There is no option for closing the remote debug connection while debugging is in progress
Answer is D. There is no option for closing the remote debug connection while debugging is in progress
Answer is D. In Studio while remote debugging is in progress there is no option for closing the connection

Selected Answer: C
Answer is C

questions.question_text: What happens when closing a Remote Debugging Connection while a debugging execution is in progress?
In a UiPath REFramework project, what is the primary purpose of using Custom Log Fields?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. To add specific contextual information to log messages that are relevant to the automation process.
https://www.uipath.com/community-blog/tutorials/add-log-field-advantages#:~:text=If%20using%20the%20REFramework%2C%20place,in%20the%20Process%20Transaction%20state.

choices.A: To maintain contextual insights within log messages, including secure details like credentials.
choices.B: To add specific contextual information to log messages that are relevant to the automation process.
choices.C: To modify the representation of logged contextual data as it is displayed in the Orchestrator.
choices.D: To generate extra variables alongside log messages, enhancing workflow understanding.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer B - SetOrdinal.
For example: dt_Result.Columns("Department").SetOrdinal(0)
